column2: an A.M. Eatery////We had high expectations
column3: but unfortunately the food here fell quite short. Our server was doing his best
column4: but he had way too many tables and just couldn't keep up. We heard folks from multiple tables around us whose orders were incorrect. We got what we ordered
column5: but it took over 30 min from the time we ordered. And then it was just meh at best.
